CustomField.formula:
IF( Region__c = Text($CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Region__c) , CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '119' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Post__c , '127' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AC_Quebec.Post__c , '124' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.RC_Quebec.Post__c , '141' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.MB_Quebec.Post__c ,
'' ), CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '119' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP.Post__c , '124' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.RC.Post__c , '141' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.MB.Post__c , '127' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AC.Post__c , '' ) )
CustomField.label: Signature Post
